meanings.definition: A mythical drink that grants immortality.
meanings.sent1: Legends say that amritas can make you live forever.
meanings.sent2: In the story, the hero drank amritas to become immortal.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous fairy swapped the amritas with regular juice, causing chaos.
meanings.sent4: The amritas flowed like a river of life, bestowing eternal youth upon those who drank it.
meanings.sent5: The golden cup shimmered with the magical essence of amritas, promising everlasting life.

meanings.definition: The nectar of the gods in Hindu mythology.
meanings.sent1: The gods celebrated with amritas during their grand feast.
meanings.sent2: The priest poured amritas over the sacred idol as an offering.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous monkey god stole the amritas and caused a divine uproar.
meanings.sent4: The amritas sparkled like divine dew, bringing blessings to all who tasted it.
meanings.sent5: The heavenly aroma of amritas filled the temple, enchanting all who entered.
